title: Xander Harris
text:
Xander Harris is a Principal Product Manager with a decade of experience in B2B SaaS, specializing in healthcare staffing and HR technology. He builds tools and structures that center and empower people doing the day-to-day work that makes businesses thrive.
Xander lives in Portland, Oregon with his wife, dog, and too many plants.

title: Work
text: This is my work page. Here I will showcase some of my projects and accomplishments.

title: Work
section: OR Tax Volunteer Online Calculators and Tools
text:
OR Tax Volunteer Online Calculators and Tools

I develop and maintain tax calculation tools for Oregon VITA volunteers, helping preparers navigate Oregon-specific deductions and credits. These tools support free tax preparation services for families earning under $67,000. (Volunteer)

title: Hello!
text: I’m Xander Harris, a software product manager in Portland, Oregon. I like understanding how things work: the forces, decisions, and inertia that shape systems, whether technical, political, or social. This is where I document what I’m exploring, tinkering with, and occasionally trying to fix.
